channel.title: Quick Help With An Error. [REP++]
channel.description:
So this is the code that it is picking up an error on. [code=java] if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Escalation")) EscalationCommands(c, playerCommand); [/code] I am trying to add this in.. [code=java] public void escalationCommand(Client c, String playerCommand) [/code]
This is my error.. [code=batch] src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:56: cannot find symbol symbol : method EscalationCommands(server.model.players.Client,java.lang.String ) location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands EscalationCommands(c, playerCommand); ^ [/code]
Says it cannot find the symbol.. I don't get what is wrong with it though..

item.title: Quick Help With An Error. [REP++]
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

So this is the code that it is picking up an error on.

		if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Escalation"))
		EscalationCommands(c, playerCommand);

I am trying to add this in…

	public void escalationCommand(Client c, String playerCommand)

This is my error…

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:56: cannot find symbol
symbol  : method EscalationCommands(server.model.players.Client,java.lang.String
)
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
                EscalationCommands(c, playerCommand);
                ^

Says it cannot find the symbol… I don’t get what is wrong with it though…

Read full topic
